title: Vintage Italian Car Expert/Restorer: Donnie Callaway
description:
Donnie Callaway has been obsessed with Italian cars his whole life. So much so that when people want a complete restoration of their vintage Italian car, they turn to him. 

Donnie’s YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4kCS54nYYLDFOL2QYp8osg

This show is a video: https://youtu.be/3i1rfU675Tg

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @ferrari_1966
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
